gradeDescription: B = I practiced consistent good behaviour.
whatIDidToday: played with as many buddies as possible
noteworthyComments: Happy Friday! My day was super fun, my trainers made a maze for me and my friends to go through! it was full of confidence building obstacles: I had to crawl, jump, walk over water and be ready to dodge hanging cloths, it was a-maze-ing!ðŸ’ªðŸ¤©
